title: Does anyone know this font?
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for the name of this font. ’Whatthefont’s closest result is ’Ayita’, but that font doesn’t have an italic. The font I’m looking for does have an italic.

Any clues?

Thx!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150319im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font4_6684.jpg)

 [‹ What's the name of this font? Anyone?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150319/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44776 "Go to previous forum topic") [What font is this? (Grand Slam Development Fund) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150319/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44834 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pjotr
